## Block.showDatePicker() method

Show the datepicker for the specified field

**Signature:**

```typescript
showDatePicker(field: string, row?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field for which the date picker should be displayed. |
|  row | number | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter specifying the row number. |

**Returns:**

void
